subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Acquired from Dallas before the N.H.L.’s trading deadline, Jaromir Jagr scored off his skate in his Bruins debut, a 1-0 victory over the Devils.
snippet: Acquired from Dallas before the N.H.L.’s trading deadline, Jaromir Jagr scored off his skate in his Bruins debut, a 1-0 victory over the Devils.
